TopicTitle: Looking for a fairing mod - forgot the name!

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

some time ago I read about a mod which "welds" stock fairings causing them to separate cleanly like real ones ( and not exploding in hundreds of pieces ), but I can't remember its name and I had no success by searching for "fairing" in the forum 

Can anyone help me find this mod?

> 
> Could [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124031-1-0-4-Stock-Clamshell-Fairings-%28June-1%29)be it? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yes! Thank you!

The thread can be closed
